name: Changes in R&D due to the coronavirus pandemic, by company size: 2020
description: Changes in R&D due to the coronavirus pandemic, by company size: 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_new_r_d_projects_were_started
variableMeasured.description: New R D Projects Were Started

variableMeasured.name: field_existing_r_d_projects_were_canceled

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2021 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2020.
